strapiPost.title: Celebrate The Many Cultures Of NWA During Bentonville Together
strapiPost.content:
Explore and express the myriad of cultures in Northwest Arkansas during Bentonville Together: A Celebration of Our Multicultural Community this Saturday, Apr 29, from 4-9p, at Orchards Park.

  • Front and center: The family-friendly event will showcase various multicultural performances on the mainstage, starting at 2p with the Home Sweet Home Family Show, followed by ten multicultural entertainment acts, each celebrating their unique heritage.
  • One big family: Besides the mainstage, several organizations will offer different cultural activities for the community to experience around Orchards Park, providing Bentonville residents an opportunity to celebrate their respective cultures and introduce them to other local families.

Learn more about the event HERE.
